items.content: Added a warning telling Internet Explorer users to get a better browser
Updated FAQ for "How to embed images?"
Open single-message view automatically in a new tab when you bookmark a message
Added Social Media Sharing buttons to the Sharing Link dialog. Uses native sharing on mobile devices and custom links on desktops.
Added support for embedding images, including a new embed helper button in the formatting bar and disclaimer about responsibilities regarding images in the send confirm dialog
Added an Emoji button in the formatting bar, guiding users on how to open the emoji menu on their devices
Added "Signing is better on a desktop/laptop!" alert and dialog if a mobile device is detected
Clicking the bookmark button on a message opens it in a new tab so you can bookmark it in your browser
You can now delete messages from the carousel
The Responses List button will now pop out the first time to draw your attention to it. If you want to see it again, delete your cookies for the website.
Added questions about embedding images into messages, changing your display name and custom sharing links
Added warning for Internet Explorer users, telling them to use a newer browser
Added summaries and clauses about image sharing
The footer and navbar are slightly shorter
The Hamburger icon on mobile devices is now a bit brighter to be more visible
Moved the Responses List button on mobile devices for easier one-handed access
Removed random scrollbars appearing in our pictures
Updated branding and capitalization for our brand. Virtrolio (capital V) is our company, while what we provide to you (your 'virtrolio') uses a lowercase V
Added support for mobile popup browsers (like the ones that open when tapping a link in Instagram or Twitter). Previously produced an Access Denied error when trying to login
Any errors that occur during the sign-in process will now log you out to prevent further issues from trying to use the website with incomplete user data
Pressing a format button should no longer cause a long message to scroll to the top
